subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: In a season in which the toughest question for the N.F.L. to answer — on the field, at least — was “Was that a catch?,” perhaps the biggest play of the Super Bowl involved such a vexing and controversial query.
snippet: In a season in which the toughest question for the N.F.L. to answer — on the field, at least — was “Was that a catch?,” perhaps the biggest play of the Super Bowl involved such a vexing and controversial query.
